title: libcore is broken
body:
libcore can no longer be compiled for a standalone/bare-bones project. Attempting to compile it with the latest nightly (ea6f65c5f) yields over 100 errors related to `uint_module` and `deriving`:

``` rust
/usr/local/bin/rustc --target x86_64-apple-darwin -O -Z no-landing-pads -C no-stack-check --out-dir target/x86_64-apple-darwin libcore/lib.rs
libcore/num/uint.rs:19:27: 19:38 error: unresolved name `int::BITS`
libcore/num/uint.rs:19 uint_module! { uint, int, ::int::BITS }
                                                 ^~~~~~~~~~~
libcore/num/uint_macros.rs:13:1: 25:4 note: in expansion of uint_module!
libcore/num/uint.rs:19:1: 19:40 note: expansion site
libcore/num/uint.rs:19:27: 19:38 error: unresolved name `int::BITS`
libcore/num/uint.rs:19 uint_module! { uint, int, ::int::BITS }
                                                 ^~~~~~~~~~~
libcore/num/uint_macros.rs:13:1: 25:4 note: in expansion of uint_module!
libcore/num/uint.rs:19:1: 19:40 note: expansion site
libcore/num/usize.rs:20:30: 20:43 error: unresolved name `isize::BITS`
libcore/num/usize.rs:20 uint_module! { usize, isize, ::isize::BITS }
                                                     ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
libcore/num/uint_macros.rs:13:1: 25:4 note: in expansion of uint_module!
libcore/num/usize.rs:20:1: 20:45 note: expansion site
libcore/num/usize.rs:20:30: 20:43 error: unresolved name `isize::BITS`
libcore/num/usize.rs:20 uint_module! { usize, isize, ::isize::BITS }
                                                     ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
libcore/num/uint_macros.rs:13:1: 25:4 note: in expansion of uint_module!
libcore/num/usize.rs:20:1: 20:45 note: expansion site
libcore/num/usize.rs:20:16: 20:21 error: use of undeclared type name `usize`
libcore/num/usize.rs:20 uint_module! { usize, isize, ::isize::BITS }
                                       ^~~~~
libcore/num/uint_macros.rs:13:1: 25:4 note: in expansion of uint_module!
libcore/num/usize.rs:20:1: 20:45 note: expansion site
libcore/num/usize.rs:20:16: 20:21 error: use of undeclared type name `usize`
libcore/num/usize.rs:20 uint_module! { usize, isize, ::isize::BITS }
                                       ^~~~~
libcore/num/uint_macros.rs:13:1: 25:4 note: in expansion of uint_module!
libcore/num/usize.rs:20:1: 20:45 note: expansion site
libcore/num/usize.rs:20:16: 20:21 error: use of undeclared type name `usize`
libcore/num/usize.rs:20 uint_module! { usize, isize, ::isize::BITS }
                                       ^~~~~
libcore/num/uint_macros.rs:13:1: 25:4 note: in expansion of uint_module!
libcore/num/usize.rs:20:1: 20:45 note: expansion site
libcore/num/usize.rs:20:16: 20:21 error: use of undeclared type name `usize`
libcore/num/usize.rs:20 uint_module! { usize, isize, ::isize::BITS }
                                       ^~~~~
libcore/num/uint_macros.rs:13:1: 25:4 note: in expansion of uint_module!
libcore/num/usize.rs:20:1: 20:45 note: expansion site
libcore/num/usize.rs:20:16: 20:21 error: use of undeclared type name `usize`
libcore/num/usize.rs:20 uint_module! { usize, isize, ::isize::BITS }
                                       ^~~~~
libcore/num/uint_macros.rs:13:1: 25:4 note: in expansion of uint_module!
libcore/num/usize.rs:20:1: 20:45 note: expansion site
libcore/num/mod.rs:1233:10: 1233:14 error: failed to resolve. Could not find `kinds` in `std`
libcore/num/mod.rs:1233 #[derive(Copy, PartialEq, Show)]
                                 ^~~~
note: in expansion of #[derive]
libcore/num/mod.rs:1233:1: 1233:33 note: expansion site
libcore/num/mod.rs:1233:10: 1233:14 error: attempt to implement a nonexistent trait `std::kinds::Copy`
libcore/num/mod.rs:1233 #[derive(Copy, PartialEq, Show)]
                                 ^~~~
note: in expansion of #[derive]
libcore/num/mod.rs:1233:1: 1233:33 note: expansion site
libcore/intrinsics.rs:51:10: 51:14 error: failed to resolve. Could not find `kinds` in `std`
libcore/intrinsics.rs:51 #[derive(Copy)]
                                  ^~~~
note: in expansion of #[derive]
libcore/intrinsics.rs:51:1: 51:16 note: expansion site
libcore/intrinsics.rs:51:10: 51:14 error: attempt to implement a nonexistent trait `std::kinds::Copy`
libcore/intrinsics.rs:51 #[derive(Copy)]
                                  ^~~~
note: in expansion of #[derive]
libcore/intrinsics.rs:51:1: 51:16 note: expansion site
libcore/intrinsics.rs:554:17: 554:21 error: failed to resolve. Could not find `kinds` in `std`
libcore/intrinsics.rs:554 #[derive(Clone, Copy, PartialEq, Eq, Show)]
                                          ^~~~
note: in expansion of #[derive]
libcore/intrinsics.rs:554:1: 554:44 note: expansion site
libcore/intrinsics.rs:554:17: 554:21 error: attempt to implement a nonexistent trait `std::kinds::Copy`
libcore/intrinsics.rs:554 #[derive(Clone, Copy, PartialEq, Eq, Show)]
                                          ^~~~
note: in expansion of #[derive]
libcore/intrinsics.rs:554:1: 554:44 note: expansion site

...

libcore/fmt/mod.rs:203:10: 203:14 error: failed to resolve. Could not find `kinds` in `std`
libcore/fmt/mod.rs:203 #[derive(Copy)]
                                ^~~~
note: in expansion of #[derive]
libcore/fmt/mod.rs:203:1: 203:16 note: expansion site
libcore/fmt/mod.rs:203:10: 203:14 error: attempt to implement a nonexistent trait `std::kinds::Copy`
libcore/fmt/mod.rs:203 #[derive(Copy)]
                                ^~~~
note: in expansion of #[derive]
libcore/fmt/mod.rs:203:1: 203:16 note: expansion site
error: aborting due to 134 previous errors
make: *** [target/x86_64-apple-darwin/libcore.rlib] Error 101
```
